001
002import java.io.BufferedReader;
003import java.io.BufferedWriter;
004import java.io.FileReader;
005import java.io.FileWriter;
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Date;
008import java.util.List;
009
010/**
011 * utils
012 *
013 * @author matecsaba
014 */
015public class temperUtil {
016
017    /**
018     * get millisecs since 1970 jan 1
019     *
020     * @return current time
021     */
022    public static long getTime() {
023        return new Date().getTime();
024    }
025
026    /**
027     * convert time to string
028     *
029     * @param tim current time
030     * @param when time to write
031     * @return nice string
032     */
033    public static String timePast(long tim, long when) {
034        long i = (tim - when) / 1000;
035        String a = (i % 60) + "s";
036        i = i / 60;
037        if (i > 0) {
038            a = (i % 60) + "m" + a;
039            i = i / 60;
040        }
041        if (i > 0) {
042            a = (i % 24) + "h" + a;
043            i = i / 24;
044        }
045        if (i > 0) {
046            a = i + "d" + a;
047        }
048        return a;
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * sleep some time without wakeups
053     *
054     * @param msec time
055     */
056    public static void sleep(int msec) {
057        if (msec < 1) {
058            return;
059        }
060        try {
061            synchronized (sleeper) {
062                sleeper.wait(msec);
063            }
064        } catch (Exception e) {
065        }
066    }
067
068    private final static Object sleeper = new Object();
069
070    /**
071     * append one line
072     *
073     * @param fn file name
074     * @param ln line
075     */
076    public static void append(String fn, String ln) {
077        try {
078            BufferedWriter f = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(fn, true));
079            f.append(ln + "\n");
080            f.close();
081        } catch (Exception e) {
082        }
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * read up file
087     *
088     * @param fn file name
089     * @return lines
090     */
091    public static List<String> readup(String fn) {
092        List<String> l = new ArrayList<String>();
093        try {
094            BufferedReader f = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(fn));
095            while (f.ready()) {
096                l.add(f.readLine());
097            }
098            f.close();
099        } catch (Exception e) {
100        }
101        return l;
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * convert string to number
106     *
107     * @param s string to convert
108     * @return value of string, 0 if failed to convert
109     */
110    public static float str2num(String s) {
111        float i = 0;
112        s = s.trim();
113        try {
114            i = Float.parseFloat(s);
115        } catch (Exception e) {
116        }
117        return i;
118    }
119
120}
